# Remi â€“ Friend Reconnection Platform

## ðŸ’¡ MVP Goals
Build a minimal, emotionally warm, privacy-conscious app that lets users:
- Softly reconnect with old friends without pressure.
- Reminisce over shared memories in a lightweight way.

## âœ… Feature Set (MVP Scope)

### 1. ðŸ”’ Mutual Interest Reconnection
**Feature:** Private Reconnection Ranking System

**User Story:** As a user, I want to rank how interested I am in reconnecting with old friends, so I can express curiosity without fear of rejection.

**Requirements:**
- UI for ranking friends (1â€“7 scale)
- Rankings are stored securely and privately
- Notification/Reveal only when two users rank each other â‰¥6
- User settings for visibility, block/mute, opt-out

### 2. ðŸ§  Memory Share & Reminiscence Thread
**Feature:** Memory Ping

**User Story:** As a user, I want to send a photo or message from the past to a friend to let them know I'm thinking about them.

**Requirements:**
- Memory entry (photo + caption, optionally timestamped)
- Send to one or more friends
- Recipient can react (emoji), reply (text/photo), or add to memory thread
- Memories stored in a personal timeline (user-only)

### 3. ðŸ•Šï¸ Soft Contact (Non-Intrusive Ping)
**Feature:** Wave / Thinking of You

**User Story:** As a user, I want to send a soft wave so I can reconnect without initiating a full conversation.

**Requirements:**
- Wave button on profile or memory
- One-click interaction
- Optional pre-filled message suggestions ("This made me think of you", etc.)
- Recipient can reply, ignore, or wave back

### 4. ðŸ‘¥ Friend Discovery & Memory Matching
**Feature:** Memory-Based Reconnect Suggestions + Anonymous Pre-Signup Rating

**User Story:** As a user, I want to see old friends I shared good times with, even if we haven't spoken in years.

**Requirements:**
- Suggested friends based on past contact, uploads, shared tags
- Tagging memories (e.g., "college", "wedding", "NYC")
- People suggestion: "You and Alex were in 4 photos from 2012 â€“ want to reconnect?"
- Import friends from Facebook/Instagram/LinkedIn/Contacts (via OAuth or upload)
- Privately rate friends even if they haven't joined Remi yet
- Rankings stored anonymously and linked via hashed identifiers (e.g. email/phone hash)
- When a contact joins Remi, they're shown any mutual ratings that meet criteria (â‰¥6)
- Matching system triggers when both users rate each other highly after onboarding

### 5. ðŸ›¡ï¸ Privacy & Emotional Safety Tools
**Feature:** Control & Consent Mechanisms

**User Story:** As a user, I want to feel emotionally safe using Remi and stay in control of who sees or contacts me.

**Requirements:**
- Block, mute, hide, or restrict
- No ranking disclosures unless mutual
- Opt-out of memory sharing or discovery
- Clear, warm onboarding about privacy practices
